author: Anthony Wieland
comment: Supports gifs however when viewing a gif, the app adds a weird white block to the right of the gif and glitches the resolution of the gif. Please fix immediately. This app is great and from what I read it had all the bells and whistles but I love my gifs and memes! The no-ad feature is nice, something a lot of third-party gallery apps lack. I love this third-party app for the reason a good trustworthy developer is behind it.

author: Scott Merkel
comment: At first the ads were annoying, but i get it - a free app might have ads to pay the bills. But then they started video ads.  I'd be trying to show a client a picture of some of my work and then a video ad would start playing, with sound, with no way to turn it off. I'm done with this app

author: Leah Dettmer
comment: I like how it has a folder that is literally every photo from every folder, it's a nice feature, but the inability to add photos onto my SD card is a bit annoying. Not sure if apps are capable of doing that, though. And it seems to sometimes get cover photos stuck as photos no longer downloaded to my phone.

author: Rahul Sarda
comment: I like the app...It's the best amongst others but now that I have changed my phone to one plus 5t the image rotate and are half cut so please fix this issue. I want to purchase the app but not until it is compatible to my new phone.

author: Joseph Lynn
comment: It wasn't that bad until these last couple updates & the ads got to be way too much. I don't need to see ads from an app on my lock screen every time i go to open my phone. I'm uninstalling it right now.

author: Mior Azwan
comment: I "almost" love this app. However, it is unfortunately frustrating if you have delete picture multiple times just to make it go away. Everytime I need to delete any pictures, I need to close this app in the background to actually delete pictures.

author: araL nedleS
comment: The app itself is decent enough and well laid out however the adverts are extremely obnoxious. Even when my phone is set to silent they will suddenly blast out music out of nowhere. Out of principle I am reluctant to buy the add because of how unpleasant these are. Wouldn't be a problem without sound but the fact it overrides the silent button is terrible and means I have to be careful when opening the app.

author: Alana Wood
comment: Its a good app that works the way it should. However, i didn't mind the ads until they added ads that had autoplayed sound. It wound up causing distractions; when you are looking at pictures, you don't expect to have to worry about sound, and it's very sudden! I'm no longer going to use the app because of this feature.

author: Kapil Khedekar
comment: Having major issues with this one since last 2 months. No proper bug updates. Can't open app keeps shutting down.

author: Ian Scott
comment: I like dark themes. This does not have it. This also apparently has very poor detection for folders. It'll easily show the folder thumbnail as having the picture in it, but when I open the folder it claims there are no pictures in it. Avoid this app like the plague.

author: AARTA Akita Advocates
comment: Last update has made it very Glitchy, and the photos jump instead of scrolling through smoothly.  Was better.  Not sure WhyTH the Moto/Lenovo G5 doesn't come with a gallery as part of the camera...🙄

author: Judith Matthews
comment: Bad app, very bad app,  cannot access pictures at all.   Ads absolutely will not and I mean will not go awa

author: Bipan Dewan Wadhawan
comment: This new version is a bad upgrade from the original version which is also available. This has taken away the capability to edit and alter photos from within the gallery as you watch the pics. Thus new version compels you to use /purchase other editing apps.. In the process you end up paying to waste your time. Google has made a huge blunder to take away editing features of the earlier version. Not smart Google!

author: Varun Katyal
comment: It's the best gallery app. Google photos gave me headache when I was not able to play my videos with internet disconnected.

reply.author: Flayvr Media
reply.content: Hi, glad to hear you find our application so useful, thanks for your feedback! Gallery team

author: Suanlal Biengtung
comment: Guys this is awesome. Have it, you won't regret. I tried many gallery for my Android Stock Mi A1 smartphone but found none better than this. Thanks

reply.author: Flayvr Media
reply.content: Hi, thanks for your positive review, we are glad you like the app! Gallery team

author: Zach Reed
comment: Every time I try to move a group of files (either pictures and/or videos), could be two, could be a hundred, it ALWAYS puts them out of order and rearranges them seemingly randomly. Not to mention that moving the pictures themselves (even if just a very low number of them) takes a painfully long amount of time. Horrible app overall, I have no idea why I used it for so long. Perhaps because there was simply nothing else I could find, but surely there are many other apps better than this one.  [Moto Z Droid]

author: Yuvaraju Murari
comment: Video is starting from first when I rotate mobile while playing any video. It's wasting time as I need to watch same content again or I need to drag till where I have seen.

author: Prince Fall That Way
comment: If you're using android gallery wear you are doing it wrong, no purchase needed to do everything you wish the android wear would. Works great on my zenwatch 3.

reply.author: Flayvr Media
reply.content: Hi, thanks for taking the time to write your feedback, we will keep doing our best! Gallery team

comment: Ads on this app are really irritating...not because it came agin and again but sone ads are really irrelevant and abusive contents.   Do something on this!

author: Adam Wood
comment: This used to be my go to app for my photo gallery... When ads crept in I was fine with it as they were unobtrusive.  On my last use I was forced to watch a video just to see my photos.  That's gone from unobtrusive to entirely annoying.  Uninstalled.

I love it! I can organize my sweet photos and separate them from my naughty photos so if my phone gets into the wrong hands, I know o don't have to worry about exposing my naughty pics! Thank you for this piece of mind...

author: yoongi will destroy me
comment: awesome for my chromebook, since it doesn't have a built in gallery and doesn't let you delete photo's because of this. if you download something it appears on this gallery, and when you delete, it deletes from the whole laptop!

author: Saahil Mir
comment: Diagusting gallery app. So many adds popping up.. and sometimes my images disappear on their own

author: Ararara Gil
comment: Not so bad on fast picture load and gif play automatically, but i would give 5 star if you could give more option like zoom in the gif

author: Chris Wilkinson
comment: I think this is a great other app other galleries do not work at all on my phone they won't even start they just keep saying error so I am thankful for a program that works

author: Shivam Mehta
comment: Great app. Loved to use it ealier bit now there are just too many ads that makes the experience worse. And force the user to switch back to stock gallery app.
The deleted folders keep on appearing again and again.. Cant move files between internal and external memory.. Irritating Ad pop ups

author: Nilesh Kathoke
comment: Worst app.  Nowdays showing bad adds and they are playing accidentally anytime. Worst experience... Don't download.  Dev team atleast stop showing bad adds which contains abusing words and language.

author: Yashesh Pathak
comment: It's an excellent app,but had to reduce the stars as the delete function doesn't work properly. Pictures aren't deleted even after doing it. Kindly fix it.

author: Pratyusha Kedare
comment: Very compatible. Just the adds are very annoying.

author: sarvesh tiwari
comment: Everytime when i tend to change the wallpaper, it stops functioning... I always have to go in another photo app to change my wallpaper.

author: Bill Kishonti
comment: WAS good... Then the ads became unbearable, because of misclicking onto ads that appear, just as you are about to click the screen.

author: StubblyList1981 Gaming
comment: It was a good app at first, but now I'm having problems where whenever I move pictures, they would get deleted instead. Please fix this.

author: KIENNIXX KIENNIXX
comment: No possible of printing out photo from this app and still it claims the best photo gallery in Google store, rubbish. Disinstalled

author: smita navlur
comment: The problem with this app is it's ads ... very time keep popping up even when I get the calls ... I am done with it.

author: Tony Vangel
comment: Love the classy slide shows in "moments" one of the best gallery apps. Ads are annoying however. Need to remove for sure

author: Sam Wilkinsn
comment: Much more hidden spam and malware than you first think. No way to add more than just the camera folder. Invasive ads

reply.author: Flayvr Media
reply.content: Hi Sam! Are these pictures stored on your SD card? Is your native gallery recognizing them? If you could let me know that'd be great - it'd help us pinpoint the issue. Cheers, Omri // help@myroll.com

author: Johnny B
comment: Needs more settings, I like it's simple UI but it could be better without the intrusive adds, there must be a better way to show the adds, also a bit pricey for such a simple gallery when the app called Simple Gallery is free and no adds also has better settings and similar UI, come on guys!

reply.author: Flayvr Media
reply.content: Hey Johnny!  Just wanted to let you know that we've added tons of new folder management actions to help you customize your gallery. You can now create new folders, hide existing ones, sort, and move photos from one folder to another. Does this help? Cheers, Omri // help@myroll.com

author: Priya Dharshini
comment: Worst app  ever...I clicked move pictures to new folder instead moving after time out the pictures got deleted..😡😡

author: laurent
comment: Ads too boring, always need network to display some pictures. Annoying application
